title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 20
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 20
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Sunrun (RUN). Sunrun Inc.'s shares are headed for a five-month high after the solar installer said it's expanding into Florida. The company's decision followed the signing of a bill that broadens tax breaks for renewable-energy equipment. The legislation carried out a constitutional amendment that voters approved last November.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
